title: [Discussion] Spooked Traders Just Piled Into Stock Protection at the Fastest Pace on Record - Overall volume in put options surged to highest level ever - "Fear clearly arrived" - More than 33 million bearish contracts changed hands Friday across the board, the busiest session since data began in 1992
[Discussion] Pantheon: US Housing is in a recession and could plunge 20% by mid 2023. Are you seeing any signs where you live?
